text:
RELIGION

Sri Pundarikasha Perumal Temple, Thiruvellarai: Ratha utsavam, Perumal Thayar reaching Srirangam Vada Thirucauvery Asthana Mandapam, 10 a.m.

Srimad Ubhaya Vedantacharya Peetam: “Bhagavata Dasamaskandam” by R. Anantharaman, 294, Sathara Street, Srirangam, 6.30 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha: Sahasranama parayanam, Garuda Mandapam, Srirangam Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple, 6 p.m.; Sri Krishnar Sannidhi, 7 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam: Sri Rama Nama parayanam, Siddhi Vinayagar Temple, SMESC Colony, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

Deaf Enabled Foundation: International Women’s Day celebration of the deaf, Tamil Sangam, West Boulevard Road, 10 a.m.

Tiruchi Humour Club: International Women’s Day celebration — special meeting, Sheela Jose, director, Manasamitra Vidya Peetam, speaks, Hotel Sevana, 6.15 p.m.

Kurinji College of Engineering and Technology, Manapparai: Graduation Day, Kumar Sarangarajan, General Manager (Advanced Technology Products), BHEL, Tiruchi, delivers graduation day address, 10.30 a.m.

Akara Foundation for Education and Research: Parents Forum meet on “keep pace with future learning”, R. Palani, chairman, Akara Foundation for Education and Research, presides, Prasanna and Sneha Prasanna, actors, speak, Hotel Femina, 3.30 p.m.

U2Can: Free seminar on “Education abroad”, Savitri Sivakumar, Director, U2Can, speaks, V Cross, Thillainagar, 4.30 p.m.
title: TIRUCHI today
